SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SET UP AND MAINTAIN NET ZERO CLOUD
Predictions for Carbon Emission from Air Travel

Get predictions about your company’s carbon emissions from air travel. Reduce your company's carbon emissions by analyzing air travel emission patterns and reviewing rule-based recommendations to decrease the emissions.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience and the Salesforce mobile app
Available in: Enterprise, Developer, and Unlimited Editions
Enable CRM Analytics and Assign Permission Sets
Enable CRM Analytics in your instance, assign the required permission sets to your admins and users, and give the Analytics Cloud Integration User profile access to the fields that the app uses.
Prepare Internal and External Data
Sync objects locally or connect to remote data outside of Salesforce to prepare the input data required by the machine learning model.
Create Apps by Using Prebuilt Templates
Use prebuilt templates to create custom apps that have fields and data that you require for developing your prediction model. The custom apps can sync external data, deploy preconfigured recipes to generate the actual air travel emission data and the predicted air travel emission data. You can import data from an external source or a CSV file, or use the Air Travel Energy Use object.
Recipes, Datasets, and Dashboards
The app created by using the Prediction of Air Travel Emissions template creates two customizable out-of-the-box recipes, four datasets, and one dashboard.

title: Setting Up Net Zero Cloud for Carbon Emission Tracking
